data.label: Wukong
data.description: 悟空动态卡片 (Wukong) 最初是为哈啰出行投放系统定制的 Native 高性能渲染引擎，是一套完整的跨端原生局部卡片动态展示的技术解决方案，以业务赋能为中心，致力于解决UI定制化、逻辑动态化、缩短试错周期、提升人效以及减少包体积等相关问题，使得业务可以基于 Wukong 做到一次开发，随时上线，多端复用的效果。

data.label: Wukong
data.description: Wukong Dynamic Card was initially a custom native high-performance rendering engine for the Hello Travel delivery system. It is a comprehensive cross-end native local card dynamic display technical solution, centered on empowering business, dedicated to solving issues such as UI customization, logic dynamism, shortening trial and error cycles, improving human efficiency, and reducing package size. It enables businesses to achieve multi-end reuse with a single development and immediate online deployment based on Wukong.
